Text:
Thx as always for the up.

Too bad the pinhead Management at Warner Brothers and Cartoon Network decided to CANCEL both this show and GL:TAS NOT BECAUSE OF poor ratings but....get this...........wait for it.............poor merchan dise tie-in sales?!?!?!

Soooo after the season is done for both, thats it. no more episodes..

A Damn shame as both shows are entertainiing and attemptiong to tell good stories....

too bad the all mighty dollar decides what, who, where and how much is produced... further more this tv show is appealing to a very small segment of audience :( 
unfortunately it's the segment that is hardest to entertain :))
